title: The San Francisco Standard gets $150K to build an AI-powered news app
description: The Lenfest Institute is giving The San Francisco Standard a $150,000 grant as part of its ongoing AI Collaborative and Fellowship Program. The local publication, which launched in 2021, will use the funding to develop a mobile news app with a host of AI-powered features. The grant is just the latest distributed by Lenfest, a...
